metadata.title: CVE-2013-7342 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in flowplayer.swf in the Flashfallback feature in Flowplayer HTML5 5.4.1 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the callback parameter, a relatedissue to CVE-2013-7341.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
